text: Just a friendly reminder that we are closing registrations tonight! Hurry and sign up now if you have yet to do so! ❤️

Track day special - what is it  and why do we want one? 🤔The dream of many car enthusiasts is to jump into a race car and take it for a couple of rounds in the track  and a 'track day special'  something like an Ariel Atom  KTM X-Bow  BAC Mono or the Radical SR3  is just that. 😍Sometimes  sheer speed isn't everything  fun is. If you have some spare cash  you should consider getting a 'track day special'. 🏎💨👉🏻 React with 🔥 if you would love to experience a 'Track Day Special' too!➡️ Read ithere!
